name: Rebuildor
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Rebuildor is a modern platformer game where the goal is to get to the green checkmark. Carefully navigate from platform to platform while creating your own platforms on your mouse cursor by pressing space. Will you be able to avoid the perilous lava or will you become not alive.

Credits: Kaktoose

Programming: Kaktoose

Art: Kaktoose

Tester: Lukas54 on Scratch

Description Writer: Lukas54 on Scratch
